name: Colour Shapes the World
description:
All music was from Bensound https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

Sound effects from Bfxr https://www.bfxr.net/

All models were created with Inkscape https://inkscape.org/en/

The game engine used was Unity https://unity3d.com/

To restart a level hit "R"

Created by The Dulme   TheDulme@gmail.com

Made for Optical Jam #5

Apple Build: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZrlFQp1Cj2VEQ5ZKMucxNNRyte-suox0/view?usp=shari...

Linux Build: https://drive.google.com/file/d/11iENHpx_N5yl84SCJazlHlPycnOWn6Xr/view?usp=shari...
